item.description:
In the brief time I've had the poll up online, 5 members have already shared their interest in playing and/or learning to play sheepshead! It's the best card game around, and I'm happy to share this ancient 'Sconnie secret. In its most ideal form this is a 5 person game, so I'm going to keep registration to just the 5 for now. I will be happy to keep a waiting list for the event, though!

Wisconsin beer will be provided!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Monday Night Cards [Sheepshead]! Novices welcome!
